Event Enter

Event Refresh

Return

Event Start
If &Mode <> TrnMode.Insert &EventSubscription.Load(&Id) &Description= &EventSubscription.Description &Status = &EventSubscription.Status &Event = &EventSubscription.Event &FileName = &EventSubscription.FileName &ClassName = &EventSubscription.ClassName &MethodName = &EventSubscription.MethodName If &Mode <> TrnMode.Update &Description.Enabled = False &Event.Enabled = False &FileName.Enabled = False &ClassName.Enabled = False &MethodName.Enabled = False Endif else &Status = GAMEventSubscriptionStatus.Unsubscribed BtnEnter.Caption = "Confirm" Endif if &Mode = TrnMode.Delete BtnEnter.Caption ="Delete" BtnEnter.Visible = True endif

EndEvent

EndEvent
Event Enter
&EventSubscription.Load(&Id) Do Case Case &Mode = TrnMode.Insert or &Mode = TrnMode.Update &EventSubscription.Description = &Description &EventSubscription.Event.FromString(&Event) &EventSubscription.FileName = &FileName &EventSubscription.ClassName = &ClassName &EventSubscription.MethodName = &MethodName &EventSubscription.Save() Case &Mode = TrnMode.Delete &EventSubscription.Delete() EndCase
If &EventSubscription.Success() Commit GAMWWEventSubscriptions.Link() Else &Errors = &EventSubscription.GetErrors() For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor Endif
EndEvent

/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event Enter
&GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) If not &Name.IsEmpty() Do Case Case &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Insert &ApplicationMenu.GUID = &GUID &ApplicationMenu.Name = &Name &ApplicationMenu.Description = &Dsc &isOK = &GAMApplication.AddMenu(&ApplicationMenu, &Errors) Case &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Update &ApplicationMenu = &GAMApplication.GetMenu(&Id, &Errors) &ApplicationMenu.GUID = &GUID &ApplicationMenu.Name = &Name &ApplicationMenu.Description = &Dsc &isOK = &GAMApplication.UpdateMenu(&ApplicationMenu, &Errors) Case &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Delete &ApplicationMenu = &GAMApplication.GetMenu(&Id, &Errors) &isOK = &GAMApplication.DeleteMenu(&ApplicationMenu, &Errors) EndCase Else &isOK = False &Error = new() &Error.Code = GAMErrorMessages.ApplicationMenuOptionNameNull &Error.Message = GAMErrorMessages.EnumerationDescription(&Error.Code) &Errors.Add(&Error) Endif If &isOK Commit return Else For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor Endif
EndEvent
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */

Event Start
&GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) &ApplicationMenu = &GAMApplication.GetMenu(&MenuId, &Errors) If &Mode <> GAMAPiMode.Insert &ApplicationMenuOption = &ApplicationMenu.GetMenuOptionById(&ApplicationId, &Id, &Errors) &Name = &ApplicationMenuOption.Name &Dsc = &ApplicationMenuOption.Description &GUID = &ApplicationMenuOption.GUID &Type = &ApplicationMenuOption.Type &MenusId = &ApplicationMenuOption.SubMenuId &RelResId = &ApplicationMenuOption.PermissionResourceGUID &Resource = &ApplicationMenuOption.Resource &ResourceParameters = &ApplicationMenuOption.ResourceParameters if &ApplicationMenuOption.Properties.Count > 0 &IconClass = &ApplicationMenuOption.Properties.Item(1).Value &Link = &ApplicationMenuOption.Properties.Item(2).Value endif
&GUID.Enabled = False If &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Display or &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Delete If &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Display BtnEnter.Visible = False Endif &Name.Enabled = False &Dsc.Enabled = False &Type.Enabled = False &MenusId.Enabled = False &RelResId.Enabled = False &Resource.Enabled = False &ResourceParameters.Enabled = False BtnEnter.Caption = "Delete" &Link.Enabled = false &IconClass.Enabled = false Endif Endif If &Type = GAMMenuOptionType.Simple For &Permission in &GAMApplication.GetPermissions(&PermissionFilter, &Errors) &RelResId.AddItem(&Permission.GUID, &Permission.Name) EndFor Else For &Menu in &GAMApplication.GetSubMenus(&MenuId, &Errors) &MenusId.AddItem(&Menu.Id, &Menu.Name) EndFor Endif
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Sub 'AttributesSecurityCode'
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndSub
Event &Type.Click
do 'AttributesSecurityCode' If &Type = GAMMenuOptionType.Simple If &RelResId.IsEmpty() &GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) For &Permission in &GAMApplication.GetPermissions(&PermissionFilter, &Errors) &RelResId.AddItem(&Permission.GUID, &Permission.Name) EndFor Endif Else If &MenusId.IsEmpty() &GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) For &Menu in &GAMApplication.GetSubMenus(&MenuId, &Errors) &MenusId.AddItem(&Menu.Id, &Menu.Name) EndFor Endif Endif
EndEvent
Event Enter
&GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) If not &Name.IsEmpty() Do Case Case &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Insert Do 'Load_ApplicationMenuOption' &isOK = &GAMApplication.AddMenuOption(&MenuId, &ApplicationMenuOption, &Errors) Case &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Update &ApplicationMenuOption = &GAMApplication.GetMenuOption(&MenuId, &Id, &Errors) Do 'Load_ApplicationMenuOption' &isOK = &GAMApplication.UpdateMenuOption(&MenuId, &ApplicationMenuOption, &Errors) Case &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Delete &ApplicationMenuOption = &GAMApplication.GetMenuOption(&MenuId, &Id, &Errors) &isOK = &GAMApplication.DeleteMenuOption(&MenuId, &ApplicationMenuOption, &Errors) EndCase Else &isOK = False &Error = new() &Error.Code = GAMErrorMessages.ApplicationMenuOptionNameNull &Error.Message = GAMErrorMessages.EnumerationDescription(&Error.Code) &Errors.Add(&Error) Endif If &isOK Commit return Else For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor Endif
EndEvent
Event &RelResId.IsValid
&GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) &Permission = &GAMApplication.GetPermissionByGUID(&RelResId, &Errors) &Resource = &Permission.Resource
EndEvent
Sub 'Load_ApplicationMenuOption'
&ApplicationMenuOption.GUID = &GUID &ApplicationMenuOption.Name = &Name &ApplicationMenuOption.Description = &Dsc &ApplicationMenuOption.Type.FromString(&Type) &ApplicationMenuOption.SubMenuId = &MenusId &ApplicationMenuOption.PermissionResourceGUID = &RelResId &ApplicationMenuOption.Resource = &Resource &ApplicationMenuOption.ResourceParameters = &ResourceParameters
&GAMPropertyCollection = new()
&GAMProperty = new() &GAMProperty.Id = "IconClass" &GAMProperty.Value = &IconClass &GAMPropertyCollection.Add(&GAMProperty)
&GAMProperty = new() &GAMProperty.Id = "Link" &GAMProperty.Value = &Link &GAMPropertyCollection.Add(&GAMProperty)
&ApplicationMenuOption.Properties = &GAMPropertyCollection
EndSub
